## Welcome!

Welcome! This website is a demo for the *Builiding Websites in RStudio*. Also, the site includes slides and additional resources to learn more about using [Distill](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/) and [Blogdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/) making websites in RStudio.
